website_summaries.verdict: One of the more comprehensive PSAT guides available, but it carries a high cost.
pros: Many practice test questions that feature precise explanations of answers to help you understand why you made a mistake
Gives advice on understanding the vocabulary words required to have success on the PSAT tests
cons: High price for a test prep book
May overwhelm some students with details

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive guide
customer_reviews.text: Based on review of Table of Contents and flipping through several chapters. Although we just received the book last week, and the kids haven't had a chance to use it, the study guide seems to be very comprehensive, with in-depth explanations of strategies and plenty of examples. It should be great for someone who hasn't had any exposure to the PSAT.
customer_reviews.author: FBA Customer

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the tips and feedback for the top test taking ...
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the tips and feedback for the top test taking tips. It is very helpful for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This book is very outdated some of the questions are way wrong
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love the bonus added videos!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it explain the test, but it breaks down each section by topic, number of questions and subtopics. You provide concise reviews with examples and I love the video tutorials! You guys have pretty much covered everything we need to know about the PSAT test, so there's no guessing. I've purchased other study guides, but I absolutely love this one the best. Thank you Mometrix!
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE MAHARAJ

customer_reviews.title: Great study set up
customer_reviews.text: I love that I have a printed book with support material and more context, but my daughter has processing issues so going over all this information can be challenging. That said, I LOVE the video clips you can use to summarize and explain the concept to review. She may not get out of this book what one could, but she will get much more review than I could ever dream of with these little video clips. Great set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PSAT study guide
customer_reviews.text: The book is very well organized. It gives an overview of the test format. It also provides some good tips regarding how to prepare the test. Finally, by taking the practice test provided in the book, my son will have a real feel about what the test look like. I am sure my son will benefit from studying this book.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaodong Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Kim McGregor
customer_reviews.text: This review was very thorough and my daughter thought it was comprehensive. She liked the practice test and test taking strategies. She had to take the PSAT to get into a SAT prep course at school, that actually uses this program also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Overview of Questions
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that really covers the questions that you might find on a P&C Exam. It gives comprehensive answers that explain why the answers are what they are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Gathany

customer_reviews.title: Love that. I love the way the reading section ...
customer_reviews.text: I am primarily using and focusing on the English secrets. I have found the grammar help most helpful with the 12 or so highlighted errors complete with explanations and examples. And who has video codes that allow us to get even more help if we are having a particular problem. Love that. I love the way the reading section breaks down the process and clarifies what exactly is being asked.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great help for a study guide. You will not regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I felt that this was really helpful. I looked at the questions and the explanations and also did the practice questions. It helped me so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sammuel

customer_reviews.title: Psat prep
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this book for my 6 th grader. He started studying and the test prep covered as they needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this study guide for my son to prepare for his PSAT over  this summer and I was amazed how he has improved.
customer_reviews.text: I rate this product a 5/5. I purchased this study guide for my son to prepare for his PSAT over this summer. I was amazed how much he has improved on his math and reading skills. Even his teacher told me so. They asked my did I send him to summer school, I told them no, I just buy this study guide for him to practice by himself. None of the believe me, but I know this is the truth. This study guide does help my son to improve on his skills. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Thao nguyen-vo

customer_reviews.title: We’re Excited!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are excited to provide tools for our son to do well on the PSAT utilizing your products. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: alohacrafter

customer_reviews.title: You have to love the quality of the products that Mometrix puts out
customer_reviews.text: You have to love the quality of the products that Mometrix puts out. My son has this PSAT Secrets book and the flashcards that are even more powerful. Yes your kids will have to do a lot of work, but if they put the work in this book and the Flashcards will pay off big time !
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Best guide ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best guide ever I am going to use with my students. I've been teaching school students for a while now. Most of the sophomore students have a problem in order to get good grades in PSAT. They always want to learn good tip to get good score in PSAT. After sharing this book to all my students, they are very glad and eager to learn & pass their SAT with flying colours. I'll highly recommend to all the students to use this book if you want the best marks in your future SAT exam.
customer_reviews.author: k_aka11

customer_reviews.title: True Test
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea that it is a study guide, not just a practice test. Not only is it a review of the subjects on the PSAT, but it also gives test taking tips that may or may not be common sense for students. It is very helpful that it gives explanations of the correct answers, and information on how wrong answers, or no answers, are scored. What I also like is information on what the PSAT score means and which school year's PSAT score qualifies for National Merit. My child will be taking the PSAT in 4 months. That result will be a good indication of this study guide.
customer_reviews.author: Betty L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We purchased PSAT EXAM Practice Questions Mometrix test preparation, rating 5/ 5. So far my son likes the product.
customer_reviews.author: Samir Khanna

customer_reviews.title: this will the only book along with the flashcards I'll ...
customer_reviews.text: this will the only book along with the flashcards I'll be using to prep fir the PSAT exams. Really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Hetal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent review book
customer_reviews.text: This study guide helped with my test-taking skills. The practice tests are a great plus!
customer_reviews.author: Anissa Ahmadi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product was very systematic and the contents were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: 4-5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the book -- it's informative and well written. I haven't used it yet with students. My rating really should be between 4 and 5. Peggy Brady
customer_reviews.author: peggy brady

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Just started using it with my son
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Just started using it with my son, I wish I had this available to me as a student. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SP

product_meta.title: PSAT Exam Secrets Study Guide: PSAT Test Review for the National Merit Scholarship Qualifying Test (NMSQT) Preliminary SAT Test
